root.name: Frogger II: Threeedeep!
root.description: This home release from Parker Brothers takes the concept of the original Frogger and applies it to three different scenarios: underwater, on the water's surface, and in the sky. If there were such a thing as a "Frogger canon," this game, being developed by a completely different team with no connection to Konami, would not be part of it.
